description: ff. 50. 259 x 185; 190 x 120 mm. 15 lin. autograph. 18 Ramaḍān 767; on fol. 49b autogr. taqrīẓ by Sirāj al-Dīn al-Shiblī (cf. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 96); on fol. 50a taqrīẓ by Diyāʼ [al-Dīn ʻAbd Allāh] ibn Saʻd Allāh (al-Qazwīnī, d. 780/1379: Ibn ḥajar, al-Durar al-kāminah, II, 209 sq.). Incip.: ... احمد الله على جرىل آلائه ... اما بعد فان الآمال تقصر عن ادراك
author: Nassābah, ḥasan ibn Muḥammad, d. 1407
title: al-Wāḍiḥ al-mashhūd fī aḥkām al-ḥudūd.
creator: Nassābah, ḥasan ibn Muḥammad, d. 1407
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
